author: bencomic

right.text: I've lost the productive innocence I had when I worked on my first released project, and now I only release games to try and make up for the massive reputation deficit.

left.text: OK, I think it's time I made an effort to leave permanently. Why? During my year in this community, I've changed, and not for the better.

right.text: It's obvious I am no longer wanted by the majority of this community and only still exist here because you have no real reason to ban me, or worse, you WANT me to do something bad so you can laugh.

left.text: When I slipped in a poll as to whether I should leave the community or not into one of my barkness posts, I got 7 "yes" responses. I know I shouldn't take Barkness seriously, but still.

right.text: so it's not as if I'm losing touch with the better half of this community.

left.text: Since I helped co-found MZXIRC, I've found that most, if not all, of the community members I don't dislike in some way, or don't dislike me, go there,

title: he'll be back within a month, part 1
